result.execSummary:
The defendant Jolene E Anderson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony [Modifiers: Habitual Criminality], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Chippewa County Clerk of Circuit Court

civilJdgmts.propDescr: Judgment for Restitution joint and several with Justin Krause

supervisions.notes: Chippewa County Case Nos. 14CF357, 15CF88 and uncharged DA Case No. 15-715 are dismissed and read-in.

miscConds.notes:
$449.52 represents Restitution plus a surcharge of $44.95 in dismissed and read-in Chippewa County Case No. 14CF357.  Joint and several with Justin Krause.
Pursuant to an Order (DOC-31) dated August 10, 2015, $199.52 represents Restitution plus a surcharge of $44.95, original amount of restitution was $449.52, defendant had a cash bond of $250 that was applied to restitution.

Plus supervision fees.    If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  $250 represents the mandatory DNA Surcharge.
Any assessment and counseling as required and follow through and complete all required treatment.
No contact with:  Jamie Krause, Justin Krause or Steven J Anderson without Probation Agent's approval.

timeConds.notes: In lieu of thirty (30) days jail.  Community service to be completed within the first 24 months.  If community service hours are not completed, Defendant is to serve the thirty (30) days jail (8 hours of community service equals 1 day jail).

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes:
208 days credit.
